attributes.name: Heretic
attributes.description: "They tell us sorcery is evil. Why then, do they use it against us?"
attributes.parsed_description: "They tell us sorcery is evil. Why then, do they use it against us?"

attributes.name: Heretic's Flintlock
attributes.description: "Ignore the barrel poined at your head, just listen to what I have to say!"
attributes.parsed_description: "Ignore the barrel poined at your head, just listen to what I have to say!"

attributes.name: Hidden Depths
attributes.description: "Beneath what seems obvious are hidden depths, waiting to be revealed."
attributes.parsed_description: "Beneath what seems obvious are hidden depths, waiting to be revealed."

attributes.name: Hidden Truths
attributes.description: "Look beyond the curtain, not all is as it may seem."
attributes.parsed_description: "Look beyond the curtain, not all is as it may seem."

attributes.name: Highborne's Staff
attributes.description: "This weapon is fit for a nobleman, what is a commoner such as yourself doing with it?"
attributes.parsed_description: "This weapon is fit for a nobleman, what is a commoner such as yourself doing with it?"

attributes.name: Higher Purpose
attributes.description: "You do all that you must in service of the great one."
attributes.parsed_description: "You do all that you must in service of the great one."

attributes.name: High Priest's Ceremonial Hatchet
attributes.description: "The high priest kept a hatchet next to his altar, using it for a wide variety of ceremonies and sacrifices. Little did he know he would one day become the sacrifice."
attributes.parsed_description: "The high priest kept a hatchet next to his altar, using it for a wide variety of ceremonies and sacrifices. Little did he know he would one day become the sacrifice."

attributes.name: Hollow Demise
attributes.description: "Death is so...empty."
attributes.parsed_description: "Death is so...empty."

attributes.name: Holt's Fillet Knife
attributes.description: "Sharp enough that even a clumsy brute wields it effectively."
attributes.parsed_description: "Sharp enough that even a clumsy brute wields it effectively."

attributes.name: Honorbound Rapier
attributes.description: "Honor above all else."
attributes.parsed_description: "Honor above all else."

attributes.name: Honorsbane
attributes.description: "Honorable people rarely live long."
attributes.parsed_description: "Honorable people rarely live long."

attributes.name: Hope
attributes.description: "Do not fear, hope is no illusion. I hold it in my hand."
attributes.parsed_description: "Do not fear, hope is no illusion. I hold it in my hand."

attributes.name: Hopelessness
attributes.description: "Let the dread wash over you. All hope is lost."
attributes.parsed_description: "Let the dread wash over you. All hope is lost."

attributes.name: Hope Manifest
attributes.description: "Lest I confess, destiny's manifest."
attributes.parsed_description: "Lest I confess, destiny's manifest."

attributes.name: Horrific Beauty
attributes.description: “For all of the evil wrought upon the world by the Corrupted, there's a certain beauty in the chaos.”
attributes.parsed_description: “For all of the evil wrought upon the world by the Corrupted, there's a certain beauty in the chaos.”

attributes.name: Horrific Slasher
attributes.description: "The original owner of this axe was responsibile for the death of a cabin full of people prior to his disappearance."
attributes.parsed_description: "The original owner of this axe was responsibile for the death of a cabin full of people prior to his disappearance."

attributes.name: Horror of the Night
attributes.description: "For all the horrors the townsfolk may see during the day, what comes at night is far worse than what they can imagine."
attributes.parsed_description: "For all the horrors the townsfolk may see during the day, what comes at night is far worse than what they can imagine."

attributes.name: Hotshot
attributes.description: "You think that because you don't miss that makes you special?"
attributes.parsed_description: "You think that because you don't miss that makes you special?"

attributes.name: Howling Wind
attributes.description: "A sound like the cry of a wolf can be heard when this axe is thrown."
attributes.parsed_description: "A sound like the cry of a wolf can be heard when this axe is thrown."

attributes.name: Hubris of Holm
attributes.description: "The great Sentinel Holm kept watch over the revered tower Malocchio for generations, and it was the pride of the sentinel that led to the towers stagnation."
attributes.parsed_description: "The great Sentinel Holm kept watch over the revered tower Malocchio for generations, and it was the pride of the sentinel that led to the towers stagnation."

attributes.name: Hulking Arcane Axe
attributes.description: "Which will kill you first, my magic or my axe?"
attributes.parsed_description: "Which will kill you first, my magic or my axe?"

attributes.name: Hulking Berserker's Battleaxe
attributes.description: "The berserker wielded two great axes, a feat that should not have been possible."
attributes.parsed_description: "The berserker wielded two great axes, a feat that should not have been possible."

attributes.name: Hulking Great Axe
attributes.description: "Why would anyone need an axe this large."
attributes.parsed_description: "Why would anyone need an axe this large."

attributes.name: Hulking Hatchet
attributes.description: "Far too large to truly be an effective throwing axe, but just too small to qualify as a battle axe."
attributes.parsed_description: "Far too large to truly be an effective throwing axe, but just too small to qualify as a battle axe."

attributes.name: Hulking Spear
attributes.description: "The massive size of this weapon makes it unwieldy to wield for humans, yet perfect for the forces of the Corrupted."
attributes.parsed_description: "The massive size of this weapon makes it unwieldy to wield for humans, yet perfect for the forces of the Corrupted."

attributes.name: Humming Crystal Javelin
attributes.description: "The spearhead vibrates as you move the spear from side to side."
attributes.parsed_description: "The spearhead vibrates as you move the spear from side to side."

attributes.name: Humming Hatchet
attributes.description: "The corruption hums within the weapon, a low eerie vibration that never ceases to stop."
attributes.parsed_description: "The corruption hums within the weapon, a low eerie vibration that never ceases to stop."

attributes.name: Hunter's Longshot
attributes.description: "Patience is key when hunting. Fire too soon and your prey escapes. Fire too late and you miss your chance."
attributes.parsed_description: "Patience is key when hunting. Fire too soon and your prey escapes. Fire too late and you miss your chance."

attributes.name: Hurricane's Herald
attributes.description: "The winds howl as this axe is swung."
attributes.parsed_description: "The winds howl as this axe is swung."

attributes.name: Icebound Trueshot
attributes.description: "Never miss a shot."
attributes.parsed_description: "Never miss a shot."

attributes.name: Ice Cold Heartcleaver
attributes.description: "First she tore at his limbs, then she tore at his heart."
attributes.parsed_description: "First she tore at his limbs, then she tore at his heart."

attributes.name: Iced Crusher
attributes.description: "Smashing your way through the tundra is an effective way to travel."
attributes.parsed_description: "Smashing your way through the tundra is an effective way to travel."

attributes.name: Iced Slicer
attributes.description: "With ice in my veins I will hunt you down."
attributes.parsed_description: "With ice in my veins I will hunt you down."

attributes.name: Iceforged Rapier
attributes.description: "Quickly cooled and enchanted with the power of the tundra."
attributes.parsed_description: "Quickly cooled and enchanted with the power of the tundra."

attributes.name: Ice Gauntlet
attributes.description: This Ice Gauntlet has clearly seen much use, but it is none the worse for wear.
attributes.parsed_description: This Ice Gauntlet has clearly seen much use, but it is none the worse for wear.

attributes.name: Ice Gauntlet
attributes.description: This Ice Gauntlet has clearly seen much use, but it is none the worse for wear.

attributes.name: Icepick
attributes.description: "The glacial freeze is difficult to break up. In my years of exploration I've found that quick and powerful jabs yield the most consistent results."
attributes.parsed_description: "The glacial freeze is difficult to break up. In my years of exploration I've found that quick and powerful jabs yield the most consistent results."

attributes.name: Icestriker
attributes.description: "Break through the glacial wall."
attributes.parsed_description: "Break through the glacial wall."
